Name: Snowflake Pentacle Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Do you like ice cream or ice? This snowflake pentacle enables you to double-jump and move at a noticeably fast speed.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
Do you like ice cream or ice? This snowflake pentacle enables you to double-jump and move at a noticeably fast speed. Double-click your destination on the World Map and you will automatically fly toward it along the navigation route. (Auto flight is available only on certain continents, including Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Mount-permitted continents by buying Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Do you like ice cream or ice? This snowflake pentacle enables you to double-jump and move at a noticeably fast speed.

H.Old: DEF: +10, MSPD: 170, Auto Pilot MSPD: Very Fast, Jump: 120

h1.Old: DEF: +10, MSPD: 170, Auto Pilot MSPD: Very Fast, Jump: 120
